casebody.data:
STATE of Missouri, Plaintiff/Respondent,
v.
Emil G. SCHAGER, Defendant/Appellant. NO. ED 105147 Missouri Court of Appeals, Eastern District, DIVISION FOUR. Filed: March 13, 2018 FOR APPELLANT: Samuel E. Buffaloe, 1000 West Nifong, Bldg. 7, Suite 100, Columbia, Missouri 65203. FOR RESPONDENT: Mary H. Moore, P.O. Box 899, Jefferson City, Missouri 65102. Before Colleen Dolan, P.J., Mary K. Hoff, J., and Lisa S. Van Amburg, J.

ORDER

PER CURIAM

Emil Schager appeals the trial court's judgment and sentence after a jury convicted him of nineteen counts of sexual abuse perpetrated against his two daughters. Finding no error, we affirm.

We have reviewed the briefs of the parties and the record on appeal and find no error of law. No jurisprudential purpose would be served by a written opinion. However, the parties have been furnished with a memorandum opinion for their information only, setting forth the facts and reasons for this order.

The judgment of the trial court is affirmed in accordance with Rule 30.25(b).
